main.name: Art Beatte IV
main.description: A product focused software engineer with a bias for action and over 10 years of industry experience. I thrive on reducing ambiguity to turn product ideas into real world solutions.
main.bio: I was born and raised just North of Seattle. Building things is my passion. When I am not software engineering I create wood artwork, lift weights, invest and generally try to learn something new every day.

resume.skillmessage: I build useful things, using cutting edge technology, at scale.

OOP; Modularity; Python; Java; JUnit Testing; GUI.

education.degree: B.A. in Sociology with Minor in Psychology
education.description: Statistics; Demography; Personality; Deviance; Criminal Justice; Social Grouping.

work.description: I've been on a handful of different teams ranging from Facebook Login to Marketplace, to Messenger. I am currently the Tech Lead on the Ads Manager Desktop.
